titles.title: Federal Competitive Coal Leasing Amendments Act of 1987
A bill to amend the Mineral Lands Leasing Act of 1920, as amended, and for other purposes.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Energy and Natural Resources.
Referred to Subcommittee on Mineral Resources and Development.

bill.summary: 5/12/1987--Introduced. Federal Competitive Coal Leasing Amendments Act of 1987 - Amends the Federal Coal Leasing Amendments Act of 1976 to prohibit the issuance or assignment of competitive coal leases to an entity engaged in the extraction or production of coal reserves in a foreign country for importation into the United States.
